name: pansexual
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
sexually or romantically attracted to people of any gender: The actor was widely reported to be pansexual. At first, she identified as bisexual, but she soon realized she was pansexual. She came out as pansexual in 2019. Compare
bisexual
a pansexual person: I'm a 28-year-old pansexual, currently in a relationship with a man.
